A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An incredibly nuanced and self-aware addition to the Star Wars franchise. I really enjoyed the little injections of humor and wit\, as well as the phenomenal character development. The new additions to the cast were well fleshed out\, without being shoehorned or taking away from the established cast. The relationships that were explored in this film were surprising\, yet completely relatable. Definitely a film to be watch multiple times!
